titleStmt.title: Diatribae discovrses on on divers texts of Scriptvre / delivered upon severall occasions by Joseph Mede ...
Selections. 1642
titleStmt.author: Mede, Joseph, 1586-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.F. for John Clark ...,

notesStmt.note: "Diatribae, or, A continuation of certain discovrses on sundry texts of Scriptvre" (p. [235]-467) and "The Christian sacrifice, or, The solemne vvorship in the Evcharist" (p. [469]-527) have special t.p.'s dated 1648.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
